Posts.EditableText:
Now you can add games to your favorite list. 

For add a game to your favorite games list go to game page and click on heart behind the game Name in the top of the page. The heart change color from grey to pink. The game has been add to your favorite game list.

To see your favorite games list go to **My Profile** and click in Favorite Games button.
Posts.HTML:
Now you can add games to your favorite list.

For add a game to your favorite games list go to game page and click on heart behind the game Name in the top of the page. The heart change color from grey to pink. The game has been add to your favorite game list.

To see your favorite games list go to My Profile and click in Favorite Games button.

Posts.EditableText: Yaaay! This will be so useful. There are so many games I enjoy and want to remember, and until now the only way was to write some sort of lame review, just so they'd show up on my profile. So much better now.
